title: The Adventures of Christopher
description: Having recently graduated from an elite academic college, Christopher was excited to land his dream job with an international business consultant. His boss was a no-nonsense South African, ex-military, respected and feared by everyone. On his first week on the job, Christopher is taken on an important business trip with his boss and soon learns that in the high pressure world of big business there is only one way to really unwind. From the boardroom to the bedroom, Christopher quickly discovers that to make it big you have got to work hard and be prepared for absolutely anything.
author: Gareth Johnson
